attributes.action: Spend our Tax and NI properly
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2188075/Jobless-mother-seven-insists-family-deserve-1-25MILLION-taxpayer-funded-home-trashed.html

Why is it okay for hard working taxpayers to read stories like this?

Please Government use our tax wisely and not on those who think they deserve a lavish lifestyle on the backs of hard-working British Tax-Payers.
